revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Synology |model=RackStation |revision=RS816 |upc=846504002252 |asin=B01K1JSKC4 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=08/2016 |pcb_id=08-04FRM4112 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=2.5-1.25 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6820 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=N25Q64 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63CFR-TEC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type A), SATA 2, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=5 |serial=yes,, console (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1514 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1514 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3232EC;;1;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9199;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F1829;;1;,,, 4-port SATA 6Gb/s Host Controller;Marvell;88SE9215;;1;,,, MAX V 64 Macrocell Flash CPLD;Altera;5M80ZE64C5N;;1;,,, 18V 6A Synchronous Step-down Converter;MPS;MPQ8632GLE-6;;1;,,, 30V 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS7694;;1;,,, 30V 9A P-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435GM;;1;,,, 30V 10A N-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4410GM;;1;,,, 1.5-18V 12A Single Synchronous Step-Down SWIFT Converter;TI;TPS53515;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, eSATA, SNMP, buzzer, fan, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.01;Marvell v.2015 T1.0p16; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.102; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=blank |oui_eth=00:11:32 }} {{TagLine|4-Bay 1U Rackmount Network Attached Storage (RS816)}} :[https://www.synology.com/en-global/support/download/RS816 Support page]
"P/N:08-04FRM4112", "Model:FRM41L2" and "Ver:V1.2" are silkscreened on the board.
It's a 4-bay 1U Rackmount NAS. This device has 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 and 1x eSATA ports. {{See also|Synology RackStation RS812|List of NAS Devices}}
===Reviews=== *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/synology-rackstation-rs816-nas-review ''Synology RackStation RS816 NAS Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] (Sep. 2016)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 @1.8GHz :Dual Core (''Armada 385'' ARM v7) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash, 4x SATA, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: ~100-240V, 2.5-1.25A via C13
==Images== <gallery> File:Synology RS816 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Synology RS816 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Synology RS816 LED.jpeg|LED Board Top File:Synology RS816 Internal.jpeg|Internal view </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
